Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Principal Muhammad Al-Salad implemented a Halal menu at an elementary school in West Virginia because there is no record of a principal named Muhammad Al-Salad and the man featured in the meme is actually Jesse Morton, a former Al Qaeda recruiter.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or documentation to verify the existence of Principal Muhammad Al-Salad or the implementation of a Halal menu at a school in West Virginia.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that Principal Muhammad Al-Salad implemented a Halal menu without providing any evidence or basis for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is a satirical meme created by The Last Line of Defense, using an image of an unrelated man (Jesse Morton) to spread fake news about a fictional school and principal.
